channel.title: Conduit / @conduitxyz
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @conduitxyz. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Phala 2.0 combines TEE with ZK rollups powered by OP-Succinct, creating a game-changing solution for secure, private, and interoperable AI operations.
TEE+ZKP+OP will empower AI agents, like @ai16zdao's, to operate securely and enable seamless cross-chain strategies. üß¨
item.dc:creator: @PhalaNetwork
item.description:
Phala 2.0 combines TEE with ZK rollups powered by OP-Succinct, creating a game-changing solution for secure, private, and interoperable AI operations.

TEE+ZKP+OP will empower AI agents, like @ai16zdao's, to operate securely and enable seamless cross-chain strategies. üß¨

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
When I went on @BanklessHQ with @pumatheuma, we discussed why ZK is so bullish for Ethereum

@PhalaNetwork is showing what ZK + OP-Succinct can do for one rollup today

Conduit is all about helping rollups use the latest + best tech for their use case. This is the latest example

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Let‚Äôs put it in context: Phala has partnered with @ai16zdao to enable elizaOS kit AI agents to operate in TEEs
With Phala + ZK, users get assurance agents behave as programmed
And with fast finality, those agents can pursue cross-chain AI-fi strategies
Total game changer.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Let‚Äôs put it in context: Phala has partnered with @ai16zdao to enable elizaOS kit AI agents to operate in TEEs

With Phala + ZK, users get assurance agents behave as programmed

And with fast finality, those agents can pursue cross-chain AI-fi strategies

Total game changer.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Interoperability
Optimistic rollups require a 7-day withdrawal period vs. 1 hour for ZK
This is crucial for Phala, because apps using Phala need to bridge their TEE attestations to any other chain they operate on. Cross-chain is a no-go for them without ZK.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Interoperability

Optimistic rollups require a 7-day withdrawal period vs. 1 hour for ZK

This is crucial for Phala, because apps using Phala need to bridge their TEE attestations to any other chain they operate on. Cross-chain is a no-go for them without ZK.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Enhanced security and trustlessness
TEE attestations are 100% cryptographically provable. The chain they get published on needs to be as well.
Switching to ZK achieves that and gives Phala Ethereum-like security guarantees.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Enhanced security and trustlessness

TEE attestations are 100% cryptographically provable. The chain they get published on needs to be as well.

Switching to ZK achieves that and gives Phala Ethereum-like security guarantees.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: ZK with OP-Succinct does two important things for Phala
1. Enhanced security and trustlessness
2. Interoperability thanks to fast finality
These are both crucial to the onchain AI agent builders that make up Phala‚Äôs primary user base
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
ZK with OP-Succinct does two important things for Phala

1. Enhanced security and trustlessness

2. Interoperability thanks to fast finality

These are both crucial to the onchain AI agent builders that make up Phala‚Äôs primary user base

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Phala is a permissionless compute marketplace
Providers give onchain apps access to CPU and GPU compute
Onchain apps using that compute run in a TEE. Their data stays private, and the TEE publishes cryptographic attestations on Phala‚Äôs rollup confirming apps run properly
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Phala is a permissionless compute marketplace

Providers give onchain apps access to CPU and GPU compute

Onchain apps using that compute run in a TEE. Their data stays private, and the TEE publishes cryptographic attestations on Phala‚Äôs rollup confirming apps run properly

item.title:
ZK is the endgame for rollups. @SuccinctLabs OP-Succinct helps them get there fast.
But what can ZK do for your rollup today?
We worked with @PhalaNetwork to find out. Learn how ZK lets Phala give AI agent teams like @ai16zdao cross-chain super powers with Ethereum security.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: We just announced that @OnchainHeroes & @playgigaverse will be powered by @ProofOfPlay and we have more partner applications in the pipeline.
Both will use our lightning-fast VRF which we've scaled up to 75M transactions in Pirate Nation alone.
Here's a recent talk on it.
item.dc:creator: @mattvv
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Conduit powers some of the industry's most impactful infrastructure. Congrats on the launch of the Conduit Hub!
We love working with @conduitxyz to showcase developer preview features like Ethereum's upcoming EIP7702 on @Ithacaxyz Odyssey!
